This project is one of the earliest master's programs offered in the Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei region. Relying on the solid foundation of Nankai University's economics and management disciplines and the high-quality resources of Flinders University in the field of international economic and trade relations, we have cultivated a wealth of versatile talents for government, businesses, financial institutions, and other enterprises.By the end of 2022, this programme had been run successfully 33 times, recruiting approximately 4200 students. After graduation, 80% of alumni obtained job promotions in their original workplaces, and many have become leaders in their respective fields.Program Features• Two-year on-the-job master's degree program• Flinders University issued admission letters• Instruction concentrated on campus at Nankai University• Student Information registered with the Chinese Ministry of Education Regulatory Information Platform• Flinders University issued master's degree certificate, which can be certified at the Overseas Study Service Centre of the Chinese Ministry of EducationCourseFinancial ManagementProject MarketingMarketingHuman Resources ManagementBusiness EnglishFundamentals of EconomicsInternational Commercial LawManagement Theory and PracticeInternational Marketing and Economics and Trade)Master of Hospital AdministrationMaster of Hospital AdministrationMaster of Hospital AdministrationMaster of Education Management and LeadershipMaster of Education Management and LeadershipMaster of Education Management and LeadershipAlumniAlumniAlumniProgram OverviewNankai University and Flinders University, in Australia, have collaborated to offer a Master of International Economic and Trade Relations degree program since 2000. This project is one of the earliest master's programs offered in the Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei region. Relying on the solid foundation of Nankai University's economics and management disciplines and the high-quality resources of Flinders University in the field of international economic and trade relations, we have cultivated a wealth of versatile talents for government, businesses, financial institutions, and other enterprises.By the end of 2022, this programme had been run successfully 33 times, recruiting approximately 4200 students. After graduation, 80% of alumni obtained job promotions in their original workplaces, and many have become leaders in their respective fields.Program Features• Two-year on-the-job master's degree program• Flinders University issued admission letters• Instruction concentrated on campus at Nankai University• Student Information registered with the Chinese Ministry of Education Regulatory Information Platform• Flinders University issued master's degree certificate, which can be certified at the Overseas Study Service Centre of the Chinese Ministry of EducationProgram OverviewNankai University and Flinders University, in Australia, have collaborated to offer a Master of International Economic and Trade Relations degree program since 2000. This project is one of the earliest master's programs offered in the Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei region.
